channel.title: hue on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in hue on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: The integrated MySQL data in Hue shows garbled code
item.description:
Hue is a Web applications that enables you to easily interact with an Hadoop cluster. Hue applications let you browse HDFS, Jobs, run Hive, Pig and Cloudera Impala queries, manage the Hive Metastore, HBase, Sqoop, ZooKeeper, MapReduce jobs, and create and schedule worklows with Oozie.

For more information and presentations on HUE,visit its officialwebsite: http://gethue.com .
